name: NWO Simulator
description:
You are a friendly New-World-Order peacekeeper. Unfortunately humans always infer with your plans.

The world is currently peaceful but conflict is looming,
world leaders are on twitter...

Goal: Settle disputes between nations, and keep the world alive.

Controls:
- Move around the hollow world using the left & right arrow keys
- When you are standing close to a nation state, select SPACE to focus.
- Move to another state and press SPACE again to settle the dispute.
- Keep the world at peace as long as possible

How long can you keep it alive?
